summary: Internal FBI email chain from July 2020 regarding a request for assistance from Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) on the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. Multiple FBI personnel express interest in helping with case organization and discovery preparation.

events.title: Request for FBI Assistance on Epstein/Maxwell Case
events.description: Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) sends out a request for assistance from other FBI personnel for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, citing a need for help with organization and discovery preparation.

events.title: Agent Volunteers for Investigation Assistance
events.description: An FBI agent responds to the assistance request, confirming availability to help before or after shifts with projects needed for the Epstein/Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) was actively seeking additional personnel assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 2020.
The assistance was needed for organizational tasks and preparing for discovery, with projects requiring completion by the end of August 2020.
The request was described as a 'unique opportunity to assist with a high profile case'.
Multiple FBI personnel expressed interest in volunteering to help with the investigation.
The correspondence indicates the investigation was ongoing and required significant logistical support at that time.
